name: Family & Friends Support Group for Hoarding Behavior
description: This virtual support group, led by a therapist, is tailored for spouses, siblings, parents, family members, and friends of individuals exhibiting hoarding behavior. It blends education with support to enhance comprehension and coping strategies for dealing with the impact of hoarding behavior on our lives. Meetings are the First Tuesday of every month from 6:00 PM - 7:30 PM.
